one.lindegaard.MobHunting.commands

Interface ICommand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AchievementsCommand, BlacklistAreaCommand, BountyCommand, CheckGrindingCommand, ClearGrindingCommand, DatabaseCommand, DebugCommand, HappyHourCommand, HeadCommand, LeaderboardCommand, LearnCommand, MoneyCommand, MuteCommand, NpcCommand, RegionCommand, ReloadCommand, SelectCommand, TopCommand, UpdateCommand, VersionCommand, WhitelistAreaCommand

    public interface ICommand

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the command

      • getAliases

        java.lang.String[] getAliases()
        Gets any aliases this command has
        Returns:
        an array of the aliases or null if there are none

      • getPermission

        java.lang.String getPermission()
        Gets the permission that this command needs to be used, or null if there isnt one

      • getUsageString

        java.lang.String[] getUsageString(java.lang.String label,
                                  org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
        Gets the usage string for this command. This should be in the format of: " "
        Parameters:
        label - This is either the name of the command or an alias if they used one.
        sender - The sender of the command
        Returns:
        The usage string

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Gets the description of the command for the help system

      • canBeConsole

        boolean canBeConsole()
        Can the sender of this command be a console?

      • canBeCommandBlock

        boolean canBeCommandBlock()
        Can the sender of this command be a command block?

      • onCommand

        boolean onCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                  java.lang.String label,
                  java.lang.String[] args)
        Called when this command is executed. By this time the permission has been checked, and if this command does not accept the console as a sender, that wont trigger this command.
        Parameters:
        sender - The sender of this command. If canBeConsole() == false, this will only ever be an instance of a Player
        label - The command name or the alias that was used to call this command
        args - The arguments for this command
        Returns:
        True if this command was executed. False otherwise

      • onTabComplete

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> onTabComplete(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                               java.lang.String label,
                                               java.lang.String[] args)
        Called when tab complete is used on this command.
        Parameters:
        sender - The sender of the tab complete
        label - The command name or the alias that was used to specity this command
        args - The current arguments entered.
        Returns:
        A list of all results or null
